amendment.description: Amendment sought to amend SNAP work requirements to repeal geographic area waivers to allow States to exempt only 5% of SNAP recipients, set the same hour per week work requirement for married parents as for single parents, exempt parents of children under 3 instead of children under 6, require participants in training programs to go through E Verify.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 115-679 to amend SNAP work requirements to repeal geographic area waivers to allow states to exempt only 5% of SNAP recipients, set the same hour per week work requirement for married parents as for single parents, exempt parents of children under 3 instead of children under 6, require participants in training programs to go through E Verify.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 330 (Roll no. 195).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. McClintock.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 330 (Roll no. 195).
